tweet: #IOTA Crypto Core hardware completly working 🎉  ✅ LAN ✅ USB ✅ WiFI ✅ Bluetooth ✅ 3G-modem ✅ FPGA-module  Nice thing, because the SoM is using Linux most runs out-of-the-box and is compatible to Linux standard tools (iw, bluetoothctl, pppd, ...). 😍
